THE INDIGO
Indigo Suite, Best Indigo Music (2003)


I was requesting this a while back, but I ended up sharing it. Funny.

Just thought it would be nice to share this with you guys.
It's the Indigo's "BEST OF" Album released 2003, with 15 songs + 1 music video.

I like this band. Fell in love with their music the first time I heard them.
If you like indie-jazzy music (with some pop) this would be for you.
Maybe you'd like them too. ENJOY!


Official Website:
http://www.the-indigo.com

Listen to some samples at:
http://www.the-indigo.com/disco.html


--------------------------------------------------------------//++
